meta.review_content: I have been struggling to get hold of a Vodacom agent to report my stolen phone. The 082 135 number only puts me through to the Vodacom bot and this is not helpful at all. I am trying to report/blacklist my phone so that I can receive an ITC number and proceed to the police station and then do the necessary for insurance. This is urgent
